code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec minimum_operations_to_make_equal(x :: integer, y :: integer) :: integer
  def minimum_operations_to_make_equal(x, y), do: minimum_operations(x, y, 0)

  defp minimum_operations(x, y, ops) when x == y, do: ops

  defp minimum_operations(x, y, ops) when x < y, do: ops + y - x

  defp minimum_operations(x, y, ops) do
    ops_div_11 = if rem(x, 11) == 0, do: minimum_operations(div(x, 11), y, ops + 1), else: :infinity
    ops_div_5 = if rem(x, 5) == 0, do: minimum_operations(div(x, 5), y, ops + 1), else: :infinity
    ops_dec = minimum_operations(x - 1, y, ops + 1)
    ops_inc = minimum_operations(x + 1, y, ops + 1)

    [ops_div_11, ops_div_5, ops_dec, ops_inc]
    |> Enum.filter(fn op -> op != :infinity end)
    |> Enum.min()
  end
end
